verbose_text: Therefore, prophylactic total gastrectomy (without D2 lymph node dissection) is recommended between the ages of 18 and 40 years for carriers of germline truncating CDH1 mutations to prevent the occurrence of GC [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: D2 lymph node dissection) is recommended between the ages of 18 and 40 years for carriers of germline truncating CDH1 mutations to prevent the occurrence of GC
